general: Today, the Moon in Cancer highlights your emotions and sensitivity. You are particularly receptive to the needs of others, which can strengthen your emotional bonds. Remember to take care of yourself while being present for others.
love: Express your feelings without reservation; this will enhance your connection.
work: Focus on collaboration today; your brilliant ideas will be better received in a team.
health: Take a moment to relax; a walk in nature could work wonders.
advice: Listen to your heart; it always knows what is right.
teaser: Listen to your heart today; it is wise.
